definition: drum/CL:通[tong4],面[mian4]/to drum/to strike/to rouse/to bulge/to swell

sentences.english: She makes a good lunch (out) of bits and pieces.
sentences.chinese: 用下腳碎料她都能鼓搗出美美的一頓午飯。

sentences.english: My uncle has golden fingers; he can make a palace out of a cardboard.
sentences.chinese: 我舅舅的手很巧，一個硬紙盒能鼓搗成一座宮殿。
